extendedIngredients.name: white cake mix
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 cake mix baked according to directions

recipes.title: Peeps Bunny Cake

winePairing.pairingText: Cream Sherry, Moscato d'Asti, and Port are my top picks for Cake. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. You could try NV Solera Cream Sherry. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 17 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: NV Solera Cream Sherry
productMatches.description: The Solera Cream Sherry has a brilliant amber and deep copper hue. With butterscotch and pecan aromas, the sweet salted nut and brown spice aromas carry a complex caramel accent. A sweet entry leads to a rounded, lush, moderately full-bodied palate with a lengthy, flavorful finish.

recipes.instructions: Bake cake mix according to directions on package. Bake in 8 or 9 inch cake pans.Add frosting ingredients to mixer bowl. Beat on medium heat until it is all blended together. Then turn you mixer to high and beat until light and fluffy. If frosting is to thick add another tablespoon of milk.Frost cake with frosting. Add coconut to a small bowl. Add a few drops of green food coloring to it a few drops at a time until you get the desired green color you want for the grass. Sprinkle it over the cake, almost to the edges. Press down lightly. Add jelly beans.Pipe an edge of frosting around the top to make a border. Repeat along the bottom.Add a dab of frosting to the back of the peeps and stick them to the cake. To evenly space them think of the outside of the cake like a clock. Put them at 3, 6, 9 and 12 first. Then fill in the remaining spots.

steps.step: Bake cake mix according to directions on package.
Bake in 8 or 9 inch cake pans.

Add frosting ingredients to mixer bowl. Beat on medium heat until it is all blended together. Then turn you mixer to high and beat until light and fluffy. If frosting is to thick add another tablespoon of milk.Frost cake with frosting.
Add coconut to a small bowl.
Add a few drops of green food coloring to it a few drops at a time until you get the desired green color you want for the grass. Sprinkle it over the cake, almost to the edges. Press down lightly.
Add jelly beans.Pipe an edge of frosting around the top to make a border. Repeat along the bottom.
Add a dab of frosting to the back of the peeps and stick them to the cake. To evenly space them think of the outside of the cake like a clock.
Put them at 3, 6, 9 and 12 first. Then fill in the remaining spots.
